name: Elmer George
introduction: Elmer George (born 15 July 1928 and died 31 May 1976) was an American racecar driver who raced in the AAA and USAC Championship Car series between 1954 and 1964. The Indianapolis 500 was part of the Formula One championship from 1950 to 1960, so George's three participations in the event during that time counted towards the championship. He scored no championship points.
